{
    "maxLineLength": 80
}
---
somethingLongerThanNecessary ? anotherLongerThanNecessaryThing : andOneMoreLongThing;
a?b:c
f(( )=>{})
f(async( /* foo */ )=>{})
f(( a,b )=>{})
f(a=>b);
---
somethingLongerThanNecessary
    ? anotherLongerThanNecessaryThing
    : andOneMoreLongThing;
a ? b : c;
f(() => {});
f(async (/* foo */) => {});
f((a, b) => {});
f(a => b);
